articles.title: Bitcoin Trims Gains as PBOC Steps Up Crypto Crackdown - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Bitcoin fell from $35,100 to nearly $34,000 after the news started doing the rounds on Twitter.
articles.content: Bitcoin trimmed early gains after the People’s Bank of China (PBOC) reiterated its long-held anti-crypto stance, warning institutions against providing services to crypto-related companies.<li>China’… [+1788 chars]

articles.title: Two-story home destroyed in large fire on West Side - KSAT San Antonio
articles.description: Firefighters worked for hours to put out a two-story house fire near Alamo Ranch and Alamo Parkway on the far West Side.
articles.content: Firefighters worked for hours to put out a two-story house fire near Alamo Ranch and Alamo Parkway on the far West Side.
